TypeSignature.Value: public interface IEnumerator<out T> : IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Interface IEnumerator(Of Out T) Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
generic <typename T> public interface class IEnumerator : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type IEnumerator<'T> = interface interface IDisposable interface IEnumerator

span.span: The type of objects to enumerate.

summary.span: 支持在泛型集合上进行简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是为所有的泛型枚举器的基接口。 is the base interface for all generic enumerators. `foreach`语句的C#语言 (`for each`中C++，`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 方法提供的 COM 互操作性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要实现;相反，实施者只需抛出。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . 但是，如果你选择这样做，则应确保没有调用方将依赖于功能。However, if you choose to do this, you should make sure no callers are relying on the functionality. 如果更改到集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素，枚举器的行为未定义。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的实现自定义对象的集合类的接口。The following example shows an implementation of the interface for a collection class of custom objects. 自定义对象是类型的实例`Box`，和集合类是`BoxCollection`。The custom object is an instance of the type `Box`, and the collection class is `BoxCollection`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/vb/program.vb#3)]

para.span: 实现此接口要求实现非泛型接口。

span.span: Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 并方法不依赖于，并仅在非泛型接口上显示。

span.span: The and methods do not depend on , and appear only on the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 属性组显示在这两个接口，并且具有不同的返回类型。

span.span: The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types.

para.span: 实现非泛型作为显式接口实现的属性。

span.span: Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation.

para.span: 这允许在非泛型接口的任何使用者使用泛型接口。

span.span: This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface.

para.span: 此外，实现，这要求您实现方法。

span.span: In addition, implements , which requires you to implement the method.

para.span: 这使您可以关闭数据库连接或释放文件句柄或类似操作时使用的其他资源。

span.span: This enables you to close database connections or release file handles or similar operations when using other resources.

para.span: 如果没有其他资源的释放，提供一个空实现。

span.span: If there are no additional resources to dispose of, provide an empty implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T
public: property T Current { T get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定义任何以下情况下： is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 创建枚举器后立即，枚举器定位在集合中的第一个元素之前。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 必须调用以枚举器前进到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 上次调用返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 枚举器无效，由于在集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素所做的更改。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element.

para.span: 实现此接口要求实现非泛型接口。

span.span: Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 属性组显示在这两个接口，并且具有不同的返回类型。

span.span: The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types.

para.span: 实现非泛型作为显式接口实现的属性。

span.span: Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation.

para.span: 这允许在非泛型接口的任何使用者使用泛型接口。

span.span: This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface.
